auth.accounts_description: Manage your currently signed in accounts.
auth.accounts_instructions: Sign in to an additional account.
auth.avatar_description: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
auth.avatar_instructions: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
auth.backup_codes_description: Save these backup codes in a secure place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your two-factor authentication method.
auth.change_password_description: Enter your current password and a new password.
auth.delete_account_description: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
auth.delete_account_instructions: Please confirm the deletion of your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
auth.delete_account_verify: Please check your email to verify the deletion of your account.
auth.disabled_credentials_description: Choose a provider to login to your account
auth.email_description: Enter the email address you want to use to log in.
auth.email_instructions: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.email_verify_change: Please check your email to verify the change.
auth.email_verification: Please check your email for the verification link.
auth.forgot_password_description: Enter your email to reset your password
auth.forgot_password_email: Check your email for the password reset link.
auth.magic_link_description: Enter your email to receive a magic link
auth.magic_link_email: Check your email for the magic link
auth.email_otp_description: Enter your email to receive a code
auth.email_otp_verification_sent: Please check your email for the verification code.
auth.name: Name
auth.name_description: Please enter your full name, or a display name.
auth.passkeys_description: Manage your passkeys for secure access.
auth.passkeys_instructions: Securely access your account without a password.
auth.api_keys_description: Manage your API keys for secure access.
auth.api_keys_instructions: Generate API keys to access your account programmatically.
auth.create_api_key_description: Enter a unique name for your API key to differentiate it from other keys.
auth.create_api_key_success: Please copy your API key and store it in a safe place. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
auth.organization_name_description: This is your organization's visible name.
auth.organization_slug_description: This is your organization's URL namespace.
auth.providers_description: Connect your account with a third-party service.
auth.recover_account_description: Please enter a backup code to access your account
auth.delete_api_key_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
auth.sign_in_description: Enter your email below to login to your account
auth.sign_in_username_description: Enter your username or email below to login to your account
auth.sign_up_description: Enter your information to create an account
auth.sign_up_email: Check your email for the verification link.
auth.sessions_description: Manage your active sessions and revoke access.
auth.set_password_description: Click the button below to receive an email to set up a password for your account.
auth.two_factor_description: Please enter your one-time password to continue
auth.two_factor_card_description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
auth.two_factor_disable_instructions: Please enter your password to disable 2FA.
auth.two_factor_enable_instructions: Please enter your password to enable 2FA
auth.two_factor_totp_label: Scan the QR Code with your Authenticator
auth.username_description: Enter the username you want to use to log in.
auth.verify_your_email_description: Please verify your email address. Check your inbox for the verification email. If you haven't received the email, click the button below to resend.
auth.session_not_fresh: Your session is not fresh. Please sign in again.
auth.logo_description: Click on the logo to upload a custom one from your files.
auth.logo_instructions: A logo is optional but strongly recommended.
auth.protected_by_recaptcha: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA.
auth.by_continuing_you_agree: By continuing, you agree to the
auth.organizations_instructions: Create an organization to collaborate with other users.
auth.leave_organization_confirm: Are you sure you want to leave this organization?
auth.leave_organization_success: You have successfully left the organization.
auth.remove_member_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the organization?
auth.members_description: Add or remove members and manage their roles.
auth.members_instructions: Invite new members to your organization.
auth.invite_member_description: Send an invitation to add a new member to your organization.
auth.update_role_description: Update the role for this member
auth.pending_invitations_description: Manage pending invitations to your organization.
auth.accept_invitation_description: You have been invited to join an organization.
auth.delete_organization_description: Permanently remove your organization and all of its contents. This action is not reversible â€” please continue with caution.
